abstract.shortdesc: The Cortexâ€‘A76 core implements five counters, 0-4. The activity monitor counters, AMEVCNTR0-4, have the following characteristics:

ul.li: All events are counted in 64-bit wrapping counters that overflow when they wrap. There is no support for overflow status indication or interrupts.
Any change in clock frequency, including when a WFI and WFE instruction stops the clock, can affect any counter.
Events 0, 1, 2, 3, and 4 are fixed, and the AMEVTYPER<n> evtCount bits are read-only.
